name: Living in 2020: Covid Story
description:
A non-profit interactive story or visual novel based on some real life story related with Covid-19 with multiple endings.

We know that's it's already 2021 lol.
But the story is about the pandemi which started in 2020.
To mark that it's already a year since then, we decided to make it available in itch.io

It's tell a story how Adit, young online delivery driver struggling with his life situation.
The game's narrative is visualized in with hand drawn vector illustration instead of tons of words. 

Summary:
Story begin when Adit, ordinary young man as representative of generation Z and millenials, work at office. 
Just fired from his job, he faced the condition of his mother who is already sick.
From an ordinary family, her younger sister works as a nurse.
Adit is the only man in the family.

This young man forced to struggling his daily life in pandemic conditions.


Features:
Packaged as a short interactive story, Living in 2020 have several alternative endings which you can get through your choices in the game.

With 5 endings in total, the game have 2 languages in it's localization menu, Indonesian and English.

We proudly presented the game together with Asosiasi Game Indonesia (Indonesian game association) and Kemenparekraf (Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy of the Republic of Indonesia)
for GAME LOKAL KREASI INDONESIA (GELORA 2020) program during Covid-19 pandemi.
It is also a form of our social concern as part of the society.

We are currently in development of our upcoming narrative game development. 
Any support, your comments, retweet or just playing, will means a lot for us and the project. 

Thank you for playing!

Follow our Twitter for upcoming post!

You can also play the game for free in Google Play Store linked below!
Cheers, and stay healthy!
